short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: List down all countries from upwork jobs listing page , and filter/exclude listed projects from display based on selected countries

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension runs only on upwork.com website, In this extension upwork filter feature is enhanced and add the capability to exclude listed projects from display based on selected client countries.
